alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:41PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Isolated strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Judith Basin and central Fergus Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 339 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking isolated strong thunderstorms developing off the Little Belt Mountains and moving northeast at 30 mph across southeastern Judith Basin County into central Fergus County. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Hobson, Moore, Windham, Forestgrove, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Sapphire Village, Glengarry, Utica, Danvers, Suffolk, Giltedge, Hilger, Heath, Christina, Buffalo and Benchland. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 43 and 109. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
